body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia      De Soto National Memorial has a rich cultural and natural history.  Visit this page periodically to view images of the park as it is today.  Â     De Soto National Memorial preserves a small portion of the mangrove swamp of the Florida Gulf Coast. John Moerk
title: De Soto National Memorial: Photos & Multimedia
